sys_script_include.name: FilterUtil

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_6411a0de1b157010407d6575624bcb2a
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_656873_skill_eva.FilterUtil</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>FilterUtil</name><script><![CDATA[var FilterUtil = Class.create();
FilterUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

 

    stateForManagerOrCOE: function(){
        var currentUser = gs.getUser();
        // 2: Reviewed
        // 1: Submitted
        if(currentUser.isMemberOf('Skill Evaluation COE')){
            return '2';
        } else {
            if(currentUser.isMemberOf('Skill Evaluation PM')){
                return '1';
            }
        }
        // Non-existing value => want to show no records
        return '-1';
    },

 

    

 

    type: 'FilterUtil'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-14 05:03:03</sys_created_on><sys_id>6411a0de1b157010407d6575624bcb2a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>FilterUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Skill Evaluation" source="x_656873_skill_eva">5f1ecd311b113010407d6575624bcb18</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Skill Evaluation">5f1ecd311b113010407d6575624bcb18</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6411a0de1b157010407d6575624bcb2a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-14 05:10:47</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
